title: Fix authentication timeout in user service
description: The JWT token validation middleware is throwing 401 errors when tokens are within 30 seconds of expiry. The refresh logic races with the validation check. Reproduce: login, wait 4m30s, make any API call. Expected: auto-refresh. Actual: 401.
result_summary: Fixed race condition by adding a 60-second buffer to token expiry check and implementing mutex on the refresh call. Added retry logic for 401 responses during refresh window.

title: Add pagination to the project list API endpoint
description: The GET /api/v2/projects endpoint currently returns all projects in a single response. For organizations with 500+ projects this causes timeouts. Implement cursor-based pagination with a default page size of 50. Support `cursor` and `limit` query parameters. Return `next_cursor` in the response.
result_summary: Implemented cursor-based pagination using encoded composite keys (created_at + project_id). Added PaginationParams schema and PaginatedResponse wrapper. Updated all project list queries to use search_after.

title: Refactor database connection pooling for async support
description: The current database module uses synchronous connection pooling via psycopg2. Migrate to asyncpg with proper connection pool lifecycle management. The pool should initialize lazily, support configurable min/max connections, and gracefully drain on shutdown. Keep backward-compatible sync interface for migration period.
result_summary: Replaced psycopg2 pool with asyncpg. Implemented AsyncConnectionPool class with lazy init, configurable bounds (min=2, max=20), health checks, and graceful drain. Added sync wrapper for backward compat. All 47 existing tests pass.

title: Add integration tests for payment processing webhook handler
description: The Stripe webhook handler at POST /webhooks/stripe has zero test coverage. Write integration tests covering: checkout.session.completed, payment_intent.succeeded, payment_intent.payment_failed, customer.subscription.updated, and invoice.payment_failed events. Mock the Stripe SDK but use a real test database. Verify idempotency key handling.

title: Update API documentation for v2 endpoints
description: The OpenAPI spec at docs/openapi.yaml is out of date after the v2 migration. Update all endpoint paths from /api/v1/* to /api/v2/*, add new pagination parameters, update response schemas to include cursor fields, and add examples for each endpoint. Generate new HTML docs from the spec.

title: Implement rate limiting middleware for public API
description: Add token bucket rate limiting to all public API endpoints. Config: 100 requests/minute per API key, 1000 requests/minute per organization. Use Redis for distributed rate tracking. Return standard 429 responses with Retry-After header. Exempt internal service-to-service calls identified by X-Internal-Auth header.

title: Fix N+1 query in organization members list
description: The GET /api/v2/orgs/{id}/members endpoint makes a separate DB query for each member to fetch their role and last_active timestamp. Profile shows 150+ queries for large orgs. Refactor to use a single JOIN query with the org_memberships table. Ensure the response shape doesn't change.

title: Add WebSocket support for real-time notifications
description: Implement a WebSocket endpoint at /ws/notifications that pushes real-time events to connected clients. Events to support: task_assigned, task_completed, conflict_detected, agent_status_changed. Use Redis Pub/Sub for cross-process message distribution. Authenticate via JWT token in the initial handshake.

title: Migrate environment config from dotenv to pydantic-settings
description: Replace the manual os.environ.get() calls scattered across the codebase with a centralized pydantic BaseSettings config class. Define all env vars with types, defaults, and validation. Add .env.example with documentation for each variable. Ensure backward compatibility with existing UPPER_CASE env var names.

title: Set up structured logging with correlation IDs
description: Replace print-based debugging with structlog JSON logging. Every log line should include: timestamp, level, logger name, correlation_id (from X-Request-ID header or generated UUID). Add middleware to inject correlation ID into the async context. Configure log levels per module via env var.

title: Add Elasticsearch-based full-text search for projects
description: Implement a search endpoint at GET /api/v2/projects/search that queries Elasticsearch for projects matching a free-text query. Index project name, description, and README content. Support filters by language, last_updated range, and owner. Return highlighted snippets in results.

title: Implement automatic retry for failed Stripe payments
description: When a payment_intent.payment_failed webhook fires, schedule an automatic retry with exponential backoff (1h, 4h, 24h). After 3 failures, notify the customer via email and suspend their subscription. Track retry state in the payments table. Use APScheduler for scheduling.

title: Add RBAC permission checks to organization endpoints
description: Implement role-based access control for all /api/v2/orgs/* endpoints. Roles: owner, admin, member, viewer. Owners can do everything. Admins can manage members but not delete org. Members can read and create projects. Viewers are read-only. Add a @require_role('admin') decorator for routes.

title: Fix timezone handling in scheduled task runner
description: Scheduled tasks are running at incorrect times for users in non-UTC timezones. The cron parser assumes UTC but user-specified times are in their local timezone. Store all schedules in UTC internally and convert on display. Fix the Schedule model to include timezone field.

title: Optimize Docker image size for production deployment
description: Current Docker image is 1.8GB. Target: under 200MB. Switch to multi-stage build with python:3.12-slim as runtime base. Use uv for dependency installation in build stage. Strip debug symbols from C extensions. Remove test files, docs, and cache directories from final image.
error_message: Build failed: uv pip install --system flag not supported in slim base image. Need to install uv via standalone installer instead of pip. The multi-stage approach works but the final COPY --from=builder stage missed the virtualenv path.

title: Add health check endpoint with dependency status
description: Create GET /health and GET /health/ready endpoints. /health returns 200 if the process is alive. /health/ready checks all dependencies (Postgres, Redis, Elasticsearch, Stripe API) and returns 503 if any are unhealthy. Include response time for each dependency in the response body.

title: Implement CSV export for analytics dashboard data
description: Add a GET /api/v2/analytics/export endpoint that generates CSV files for dashboard data. Support date range filtering, metric selection, and grouping by project/team. Stream the CSV response for large datasets to avoid memory issues. Add Content-Disposition header for browser download.

title: Add end-to-end encryption for organization secrets
description: Implement client-side encryption for org secrets (API keys, tokens stored in the secrets vault). Use AES-256-GCM for encryption, derive key from org master password via Argon2id. Store encrypted blobs in Postgres, never store plaintext keys. Add key rotation endpoint.
